gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.bayesian.conjugate

Class GammaInverseScaleBayesianEstimator

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.sandia.cognition.util.AbstractCloneableSerializable
      • gov.sandia.cognition.learning.algorithm.AbstractBatchAndIncrementalLearner<ObservationType,BeliefType>
        • gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.bayesian.conjugate.AbstractConjugatePriorBayesianEstimator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution,GammaDistribution>
          • gov.sandia.cognition.statistics.bayesian.conjugate.GammaInverseScaleBayesianEstimator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BatchAndIncrementalLearner<java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution>, BatchLearner<java.util.Collection<? extends java.lang.Double>,GammaDistribution>, IncrementalLearner<java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution>, BayesianEstimator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution>, ConjugatePriorBayesianEstimator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution,GammaDistribution>, RecursiveBayesianEstimator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution>, CloneableSerializable, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class GammaInverseScaleBayesianEstimator
extends AbstractConjugatePriorBayesianEstimator<java.lang.Double,java.lang.Double,GammaDistribution,GammaDistribution>
    A Bayesian estimator for the scale parameter of a Gamma distribution using the conjugate prior Gamma distribution for the inverse-scale (rate) of the Gamma.
    Since:
    3.0
    Author:
    Kevin R. Dixon
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • computeEquivalentSampleSize

        public double computeEquivalentSampleSize(GammaDistribution belief)
        Description copied from interface: ConjugatePriorBayesianEstimator
        Computes the equivalent sample size of using the given prior. This is effectively how many samples of bias the prior injects into the estimate.
        Parameters:
        belief - Prior belief to measure.
        Returns:
        Equivalent sample size of the initial belief.
